extendedInfo.description: Please stand by while app is reborn...  (2013-06-29)FFXIV Guide includes a Recipe Book, Item Listing, Ability Listing, Battle Regimens reference, Leve Tracker, and Quest Assistant.Coarse Location (not GPS) is used for ad targeting.If Recipe Book freezes:Go to Settings > Applications > Manage Applications > FFXIV Guide > Clear Data

reviews.comment: With no PS3 version coming out guess having this on my phone is pointless , still it would have been a useful app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: Please update everything here and I promise you\'ll get 5 stars. It has great potential!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: boo
reviews.comment: this app has been abandoned and with the game going through so many changes it is almost like a guide to a different game that doesn\'t exist anymore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid x
reviews.comment: Great up, really need to update. Would pay if all game quest were added.  And regular updates, as game updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice. Keep up the good work. I\'ll get the paid version soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but....
reviews.comment: Love the app... Its smoothe, easy to use and full of useful info! Too bad every piece of info it ha is out of date... Dont do it till its updated...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For beginners it\'s alright but it becomes worthless as you rank up. Why? It\'s not being updated anymore, there\'s items missing on allot of the recipes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is a great app for you crafters, helps me find what I need easily without alt tab
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: great app any chance you can work in the tradeskill and gathering abilities, and maybe link the stats to the tradeskill crafted items.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Severely outdated information, and what is there is either half complete or wrong.

reviews.comment: Pretty amazing app Ill give it a 5 star for sure it could use some extra stuff added on to it but im not complaining at all
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the info, but...
reviews.comment: OUTDATED. CK FFXIV Companion much more current, as of patch 1.22a.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Hope this gets seriously updated for arr. But has great potential

reviews.comment: FFXIV has recieved a large ammount of updates since launch and this covers none of it.

reviews.title: Excellent.
